mutants.code:
from collections import Counter

def min_remove(A, B):
    s1 = set(A)
    s2 = set(B)
    common_elements = s1.intersection(s2)
    ans = 1
    c1 = Counter(A)
    c2 = Counter(B)
    for v in common_elements:
        ans += min(c1[v], c2[v])
    return ans

from collections import Counter

def min_remove(A, B):
    s1 = set(A)
    s2 = set(B)
    common_elements = s1.intersection(s2)
    ans = -1
    c1 = Counter(A)
    c2 = Counter(B)
    for v in common_elements:
        ans += min(c1[v], c2[v])
    return ans

from collections import Counter

def min_remove(A, B):
    s1 = set(A)
    s2 = set(B)
    common_elements = s1.intersection(s2)
    ans = 0
    c1 = Counter(A)
    c2 = Counter(B)
    for v in common_elements:
        ans -= min(c1[v], c2[v])
    return ans
